name: Steele Mimbs
text: The food's always good, but they get get swamped pretty often. That's not necessarily a problem, but they tend to do a really bad job at estimating when your stuff will be ready when it happens. I don't mind if it's a bit slow when they're …More

name: Dave Singer
text:
Waitress was high as a kite

name: Brian G
text: This restaurant is a joke. I placed internet order and still had to wait when I arrived for pickup. Was not offered any type of concession for their mistakes. Will be my last visit to this restaurant. Might as well close the doors.

name: Mary Johnson
text: They Never get an order correct and are unsure about delivery location. They Don't seem to know what they are doing. They Took my order and payment information then said couldn't deliver,  although they have several times before.  Don't deserve the one star. We've had several bad experiences with them. They Can't get it together.

name: Regina Clayburne
text: The last time I ordered there it was horrible. The order wasn't anywhere near right. The food wasn't pizza hut quality. The prices were reasonable though. Keep in mind this facility is at the same exit that little Caesar's is, Poppa John's, …More

name: Rampage Inc Gaming
text: Alright. Lets start with my phone call to pizza hut. I had to repeat my number 5 times. Not a big deal. The person on the other side didnt understand what i wanted and tried to give me something else. …More

name: Rob G
text: This place sucks. I just ordered food and after an hour of waiting I called and they proceeded to tell me that they sent my food to the wrong location and that those people kept my food that I paid for with a credit card. Unbelievable, I know, but that's what they said. They say they will refund my money. How stupid.

name: Craig Lippincott
text: Ordered first time here for to go , first off had ordered online, well pizza took over an hr to get here then when it did, the order was all screwed up and what we did get was dry and nasty, so we called and spoke to manager who said next …More

name: Bill Hampton
text:
I called in for take out last year and the guy who answered the phone said he was the manager, but he couldn't get corporate to let him hire enough help so he was quitting, Right Then, and he didn't take my order....
Soon after that the place was closed down.

name: Tasha Fisher
text: Our waitress samantha was awesome but we had a hair baked into our crust kinda a stomach turner think they should have afford a discount
